nodes.text:
-Minimum $1000 cash payments to all Americans + $500 per dependent
-Eradicate poverty
-Narrow the racial wealth gap 
-End the “scarcity mindset” transition to a “plentiful mindset” 
-Incentivize socially beneficial work or education to curb the ramifications of automation

 #NJ06

A Universal Basic Income will unleash our potential as human beings.

The incumbent Corporate Democrat Frank Pallone, DOES NOT support this and has BLOCKED the bill from passing.

#RussForUs #NJ06        @RussForUs2020
